backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and store checklist entries with admin-gated queries and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report documenting a feature removal related to footer branding and listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and root layout that resets admin session when identity changes.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with logo and logout logic that clears identity, query cache, and admin session.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component providing header, main content area, and a simple footer.
frontend/src/components/CameraCaptureMod: Modal for camera photo capture with error handling, preview, and start/stop control.
frontend/src/components/ChecklistItemCar: Card showing a checklist item with photo preview and a camera modal trigger.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal requiring users to enter and save their name before continuing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin session credentials with sessionStorage syncing and helper methods for saving and clearing.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Wraps useActor to expose actor readiness, loading, error state, and a retry mechanism.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, and handling login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, checklist entries, and admin-only data with backend error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom light/dark theme variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the React root.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page showing checklist entries with filtering, error handling, and admin-session enforcement.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSubmissionDetail: Displays details for a specific admin submission with session checks, backend error handling, and retry logic.
frontend/src/pages/LoginChoice.tsx: Provides user or admin login flow using Internet Identity or a form, handling credential validation, errors, and redirects.
frontend/src/pages/UserChecklist.tsx: Implements the user checklist form with photo capture, validation, profile handling, and checklist submission to the backend.
frontend/src/utils/adminSession.ts: Manages storing, retrieving, and clearing admin session data and redirect messages in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Normalizes backend errors into user-friendly messages and provides helpers to detect backend unavailability or invalid admin credentials.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, versioning, features, and pending requests for the Store Checklist Pro application.
